# Third-Party Licenses

This directory contains vendored copies of third-party libraries. Each library retains its original license as specified below.

## Systelab JSON Adapter Libraries

The following libraries are vendored from Systelab (A Werfen Company):

### 1. cpp-json-adapter (JSONAdapterInterface and JSONAdapterTestUtilities)
- **Source**: https://github.com/systelab/cpp-json-adapter
- **License**: MIT License
- **Copyright**: Copyright (c) 2019 Systelab. A Werfen Company
- **Description**: Library-agnostic API for C++ to work with JSON documents

### 2. cpp-rapidjson-json-adapter (RapidJSONAdapter)
- **Source**: https://github.com/systelab/cpp-rapidjson-json-adapter
- **License**: MIT License
- **Copyright**: Copyright (c) 2019 Systelab. A Werfen Company
- **Description**: Implementation of C++ JSON Adapter based on rapidjson
